quotes: Tawakkol Karman came forward as a courageous leadership figure during the Arab Spring in 2011
Like Iranian Shirin Ebadi, Peace Prize laureate for 2003, she maintained that Islam is no obstacle to the full acceptance of women in every sphere of society.

organizations.name: Women Journalists without Chains
quotes: She founded the organisation Women Journalists without Chains, and was imprisoned and persecuted on account of her active engagement.

roles.title: journalist
quotes: Tawakkol Karman, a Yemeni journalist, was the first woman to win the Nobel Peace Prize from the Arab world.
